training.capstone.pharma

Interface PatientRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<PatientEO,java.lang.String>, org.springframework.data.mongodb.repository.MongoRepository<PatientEO,java.lang.String>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<PatientEO,java.lang.String>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<PatientEO>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<PatientEO,java.lang.String>

    public interface PatientRepository
extends org.springframework.data.mongodb.repository.MongoRepository<PatientEO,java.lang.String>
    The PatientRepository interface provides data access methods for managing patient data in the database.

      • findByEmail

        @Query(value="{ \'_id\' : ?0 }")
PatientEO findByEmail(java.lang.String email)
        Find a patient by their email address.
        Parameters:
        email - The email address of the patient to find.
        Returns:

      • findPatientWithOrdersById

        @Query(value="{ \'_id\': ?0 }")
PatientEO findPatientWithOrdersById(java.lang.String email)
        Find a patient by their email address and include their orders.

        Returns:

      • findOrderById

        @Query(value="{ \'orders._id\': ?0 }",
       fields="{ \'orders.$\': 1 }")
OrderEO findOrderById(int orderId)
        Find an order by its order ID.
        Parameters:
        orderId - The ID of the order to find.
        Returns:

      • findLastOrderIdByPatientId

        @Query(value="{\'patientId\': ?0}, {\'orders\': { $slice: -1 }, \'orders.id\': 1}")
PatientEO findLastOrderIdByPatientId(java.lang.String patientId)
        Find the last order ID associated with a patient.
        Parameters:
        patientId - The ID of the patient to find the last order ID for.
        Returns:
        The patient with the last order ID.
